Job Description

Exciting Opportunity: Join a Dynamic Employment Law Team in LA!

Are you a passionate junior associate ready to take your legal career to new heights? Look no further! We're seeking a talented Employment Litigation Attorney to join our thriving practice in the heart of Los Angeles.

Why You'll Love This Role:

  • Be part of a rapidly growing firm (47 attorneys and counting!)
  • Work on cutting-edge employment law cases
  • Enjoy a hybrid work environment for ultimate flexibility
  • Competitive salary range: $130,000 - $160,000

What You'll Bring To The Table:

  • 2-4 years of litigation experience
  • Expertise in Employment Law, Class Actions, and Wage & Hour cases
  • California Bar membership in good standing
  • Sharp research and writing skills
  • Passion for employment law and a go-getter attitude

Your Day-to-Day Impact:

  • Handle individual lawsuits and class actions in employment law
  • Draft and file complaints, legal memoranda, and motions
  • Take depositions like a pro
  • Build damage models that pack a punch
  • Lead and mentor legal support staff

We've Got You Covered:

  • Comprehensive benefits package (medical, dental, vision)
  • 401(k) with employer match to secure your future
  • Paid Time Off to recharge and refresh
  • Formal training program to boost your skills
  • Regular performance feedback to keep you on track

Ready to Make Your Mark?

Join a team that's dedicated to excellence and representing some of the most prestigious organizations in the country. This is your chance to work on meaningful cases, grow your career, and be part of something big!

Don't let this opportunity slip away! Contact Mission Recruiting today and take the first step towards an exciting new chapter in your legal career.

Mission Recruiting is proud to represent some of the most prestigious organizations in the country. Contact us today to learn how we can help you explore this and other exciting opportunities.

Salary: $130,000 - $160,000
